DataElement.preferredName: Metastasis Assessment Yes No Not Evaluable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not evaluable indicator relating to the assessment for metastatic disease (the spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body, i.e., the organ in which it first appeared to another).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the assessment for metastatic disease, metastasis is the spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer that has spread from the organ in which it first appeared to another organ. For example, breast cancer cells may spread (metastasize) to the lungs and cause the growth of a new tumor. When this happens, the disease is called metastatic breast cancer.

Concepts.definition: The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/17/17 tt transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not evaluable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have Peripheral Lung, Spinal and/or Osseous metastatic lesions ONLY?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is this lesion a metastatic site?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there evidence of metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have Peripheral Lung, Spinal, Osseous, Abdominal-Pelvic and/or Central Lung metastatic lesions ONLY?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have evidence of metastatic or extra-orbital spread?
